DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Project HeartBeat ! uniquely design investigate course change cardiovascular disease risk factor several category covariates , include anthropometric indicator address study . The data pertain 678 participant enter Project 1991-93 age 8 , 11 14 year age , 49.1 percent female 20.1 percent black . Of 395 participant become eligible 10 4-monthly examination , 349 ( 88.4 percent ) complete least 10 occasion ; 538 participant 556 eligible seven examination ( 96.8 percent ) complete least seven . Multi-level ( MLn ) analytic method previously test data utilized analysis . DESIGN NARRATIVE : Data Project Heartbeat analyze . Hypotheses test include : ( 1 ) time pattern change several indicator body size , composition configuration period observation ; ( 2 ) relation time pattern change indicator correspond pattern change select endocrine factor ; ( 3 ) explanatory contribution energy intake expenditure variation individual observe time pattern change indicator . The anthropometric indicator address : weight ( total mass ) , height , body mass index ( BMI , wt/ht2 ) , fat-free mass , fat mass , per cent body fat , fat distribution ( waist/hip ratio ) . Each indicator examine first separately relation select endocrinologic measure ( testosterone , estradiol , DHEAS ) energy intake expenditure ( interview history diet physical activity ) . Existing data twelve 4-monthly examination age range 8-17 year conduct Project HeartBeat ! analyze . The study completion date list record obtain `` End Date '' enter Protocol Registration Results System ( PRS ) record .
